name: Lucemon_Shadowlord_Mode
description: Lucemon Shadowlord Mode appears as a large, purple, winged dragon, taking inspiration from the dragon of Revelation in Abrahamic mythology . It has the Crown of the Seven Deadly Sins on its head, which is an array depicting the Crests of the Seven Great Demon Lords , and holds an orb of darkness within its golden claws. Compared to Lucemon and Lucemon Chaos Mode , this form represents the complete fall of Lucifer into Satan in Abrahamic mythology.
